Message.Msg: It appears folks are concerned about a "much stronger competitor" in Sprint given the talk of a Softbank/Sprint merger. Spint shares are up while T and VZ are down about the same percentage. See their price charts over the last seven trading days. That's my guess. If so, I see it as a compete overreaction and unfounded panic.

The stock is only trading at about 14 times forward earnings. The price is not too high, especially with a 5 percent dividend payout. A few traders just started doing quick turn around trades on the stock while shorting it. They also called around to get other traders to pile on sell orders. This is why the stock price fail too far and too fast. It had nothing to do with any external factors, they were trading off internal or personal account information.
Hope you're right - if so when do you think it will turn around?

The company has generated revenues of over $120 billion for the last five years with positive net incomes in the billions. This trend will likely continue in future years. The stock price should turn around next week. Hopefully, the market will identify the short traders who were pushing it this week.

Joe was more like the local drunk at the corner bar that wants to argue who is the best quarterback in the NFL, but won't shut up to listen to anyone else's opinion. He was rude, disrespectful, and foolish.

Thus far, this administration is either totally incompetent, the CIA and the State Department Intelligence organization is worthless or Obama and his press clowns are just flat out lying fools. He is hanging Billary out to dry and I predict she will quit either just after or perhaps even just prior to the election. She won't sit still and take the blame for this and if she suspects that Romney has even a slight chance, she will be looking to set herself up for 2016. She is a lot like Obama in the respect that she is more concerned about her political career than anything else.

Topic.Title: BIDEN THE CLOWN...WHAT A PURE LOSER, JUST LIKE HIS BOSS, THE PRESIDENT

Message.Msg: The President said Joe will just be Joe and unfortunately for the Democrats, he was exactly just that. If you think that Biden was the winner in this debate, which won't amount to much anyway, you're more of a fool than Biden is. He was rude, foolish, and acted like a scared clown. He was underwhelming at best, stupid at his worst and made a mockery of the debate process. He would have been thrown out of a high school debate for his interruptions, his silly laughs, and eye rolling. His performance was juvenile. If this guy is truly a heart attack away from being President, we are in great danger.

At least he didn't lie to the American people like Johnson and McNamara did. He didn't send people to a war the SOD said we are winning when the entire time he knew we were losing and the US government didn't have the guts or the will to win. Which would you rather have? You think Obama had any experience to be CIC? He didn't even have the experience to be a Senator!

Message.Title: A Closer Look at Romney's Tax Plan
Message.Msg: http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2012/10/12/fresh-debate-over-new-tax-study/
much better, a revolutionary improvement

Message.Title: What Romney Believes
Message.Msg: What Romney believes! 1 Reducing taxes and regulations will create jobs. This was the policy under Bush that took our country from a budget surplus to a budget deficit and failed to sustain a vital growing economy. 2. Only those individuals currently covered by medical insurance should be covered for pre-existing conditions. 3. Competition between the insurance companies will reduce medical costs. Isn’t this what we have today for everyone under the age of 65? Have you premiums gone up and health care improved? 4. The current Social Security system should be changed to allow individuals to invest their retirement funds in the stock market in hopes of getting a higher return. How much money would you have lost if you had sold the stocks in your retirement fund at the bottom of the recession? 5.You believe that higher income earners (those in the top 10%) should pay taxes at lower rate than Warren Buffet’s secretary or the average wage earner. 6. Taxes and regulations, not the lack of demand, were the major cause of the recession. 7. That the banking and financial industry does not need to be regulated. What do you think caused the housing industry to collapse and the banks to need financial aid from the government to survive? 8. Women should be paid less than men for the same job. 9. That the United States should increase its military spending even though the U.S. already spends more on defense than the next 13 countries with the highest defense budgets. 10 That companies are people and should be allowed to make unlimited political contributions without disclosure. It is tour vote. This former Republican is voting for Obama

You're as full of crap as is Ricky and his Deomcratic Party talking points group. You don't have half of this stuff correct and you know it. Of course Ricky, Echo, etc. will not call you on your factual errors because this is the same crap they believe.

In other words, just like you and your idiot fellow travelers on this board. Quitcherbitchin, you irrelevant little troll.

Typically, tediously lame. You never say anything intelligent, interesting or clever. It is all poorly thought out, badly constructed drivel. Your writing is moronic, which in a written forum requires the conclusion that you are a #$%$ You apparently have embraced your shortcomings (giggle, giggle, grins(??), poopoo, peepee, teehee), however, your ongoing public exhibition of them to attract attention is childish and pitiful. It's obvious that you throw words together randomly hoping that, if you throw enough of them together frequently enough, one day you will construct a sentence that makes sense or that someone will find amusing or interesting. To date, your efforts are an epic failure. In the brief time you have remaining before your incipient cardiovascular disease drops you in your plodding tracks, have you considered doing something even modestly more productive with your time? You are an idiot.
